# init(_:)

**Initializer**

Creates a group resource from an array of audio file resources.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency init(_ resources: [AudioFileResource]) throws
```

## Discussion

An [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/AudioFileGroupResource] provides a single, random element from its collection of [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/AudioFileResource] objects each time [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/AudioPlaybackController/play()] is called on the [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/AudioPlaybackController] on which it is prepared.



## Creating a resource

- **init(named:from:in:)**: Initializes an audio resource from a Reality Composer Pro project.
- **load(named:from:in:)**: Loads an audio resource from a Reality Composer Pro project.
